DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , blood level , effect TRV130A pain perception sedation healthy adult male .
DOC.brief_title: Single Ascending Dose Study Intravenous TRV130A Healthy Adult Males
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male 19 50 year age Body weight > /= 50 kg Capable give write informed consent Clinically significant disease condition may place subject unacceptable risk participant study , may interfere safety , tolerability pharmacodynamic evaluation study Laboratory test positive HIV , Hepatitis B virus surface antigen , Hepatitis C virus antibody ; elevation aspartate aminotransferase alanine aminotransferase ; positive drug alcohol test ; positive urine test cotinine Major surgery within 4 week screen
